function.name: get_product_info
function.description: Get detailed information about a Sonance product including specs, features, and documentation links. Use when customer mentions a product name or SKU.

model.description: Product model name or SKU (e.g., 'UA 2-125 ARC', '93548')

function.name: troubleshoot_issue
function.description: Get troubleshooting steps for a product issue. Use when customer describes a problem like no audio, no power, flashing lights, etc.

issue.description: Description of the problem (e.g., 'no audio from speakers', 'red flashing light', 'won't turn on')

function.name: answer_faq
function.description: Search FAQs to answer common product questions. Use for general questions about features, compatibility, warranty, etc.

question.description: The customer's question (e.g., 'what is power sharing mode', 'does it support Dolby')

function.name: get_installation_guide
function.description: Get installation and setup instructions for a product. Use when customer needs help with setup, mounting, wiring, or app configuration.
